It fit perfect and was so cute for the events we needed it for!!
my two younger boys looked absolutely handsome in these outfits. they fit great we did have to iron them because of shipping but not a big deal. They looked very handsome for my wedding day.

Ordered the 8-9 for my son who usually wears 7/8. The pants were  4 inches shorter than all his other 7/8 sized pants. The suspender leather and fabric feel thin. Going to keep it because the color is unique and hard to find but otherwise I would have returned this for being low quantity.
Nice outfit . True to size.
